entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Must be blessed by a deity or celestial being.
Armor Effects: You have resistance to radiant damage and advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.
Weapon Effects: This weapon deals an additional {@dice 1d8} radiant damage to fiends and undead.
Additional Effects: You can cast Divine Favor once per day without using a spell slot.
